com.flowpowered.react.collision

Class CollisionDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.react.collision.CollisionDetection

  • public class CollisionDetection
extends Object
    This class computes the collision detection algorithms. We first perform a broad-phase algorithm to know which pairs of bodies can collide and then we run a narrow-phase algorithm to compute the collision contacts between the bodies.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollisionDetection(CollisionWorld world)
      Constructs a new collision detection from the collision world.

      Add a pair of bodies that cannot collide with each other.
      void broadPhaseNotifyAddedOverlappingPair(PairManager.BodyPair addedPair)
      Allows the broad phase to notify the collision detection about an overlapping pair.
      void broadPhaseNotifyRemovedOverlappingPair(PairManager.BodyPair removedPair)
      Allows the broad phase to notify the collision detection about a removed overlapping pair.

        Computes the collision detection.

      • broadPhaseNotifyAddedOverlappingPair

        public void broadPhaseNotifyAddedOverlappingPair(PairManager.BodyPair addedPair)
        Allows the broad phase to notify the collision detection about an overlapping pair. This method is called by a broad-phase collision detection algorithm.
        Parameters:
        addedPair - The pair that was added

      • broadPhaseNotifyRemovedOverlappingPair

        public void broadPhaseNotifyRemovedOverlappingPair(PairManager.BodyPair removedPair)
        Allows the broad phase to notify the collision detection about a removed overlapping pair.
        Parameters:
        removedPair - The pair that was removed
